name: QUALITY PARTS COALITION
description: Association seeking to preserve competition in the automotive aftermarket
sampleDescriptions: Patent law reform, specifically legislation to create a repair clause to the design patent law for automotive crash parts. PARTS Act (Promoting Automotive Repair and Trade Sales Act) - S. 812 and H.R.
